Hello React

This repository contains the starter code for a Lighthouse Labs coding challenge.

entry.title: buildspace/flow-nft-starter
entry.summary:
buildspace Flow NFT Collection

Welcome ğŸ‘‹

To get started with this course, clone this repo and follow these commands:

  1. Run npm install at the root of your directory
  2. Run npm run start to start the project
  3. Start coding!

Questions?

Have some questions make sure you head over to your buildspace Dashboard and link your Discord account so you can get access to helpful channels and your instructor!
